name: In re Frances SILOFF, Deceased. Appeal of Ann LAUTMAN

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: In re Frances SILOFF, Deceased. Appeal of Ann LAUTMAN.

opinions.text:
DECREE
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party to bear own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Joseph G. Feldman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert W. Costigan, H. Wallace Dyer, Jr., Harold Shaffer, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 743
In re Frances SILOFF, Deceased. Appeal of Ann LAUTMAN.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 20, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
Joseph G. Feldman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert W. Costigan, H. Wallace Dyer, Jr., Harold Shaffer, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
